author: Meg Kelly, Sarah Cahlan, Elyse Samuels
title: 11 to 100,000: What went wrong with coronavirus testing in the U.S.
description: Missteps in rolling out the coronavirus testing infrastructure went unaddressed by leaders at the highest level of government, leaving the country blind to the virus's spread.
content:
